author: Special Coprrespondent
text: Following the model code of conduct in force since March 4, the Madurai city police have, so far, detained 823 antisocials, identified with history-sheet and causing disturbance to maintenance of law and order. Likewise, 313 cases were booked which included 249 under the TN prevention of Public Property Damages Act. All the sub-division officers and Inspectors of Police have been sensitising public about the need to cast their votes without any fear. Public can contact police at 2520760, 2344989 or in the WhatsApp at 8300021100 in the event of any poll related complaint.
title: 823 antisocials detained
